name: places/ChIJEThdIKVZwokRUX-4-KmId7Y
formattedAddress: 386 Park Ave S 8th Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 386 Park Ave S 8th Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
Appalling account service, and a product that has some advantages but is not at all what is sold or advertised.

Frustrating and limited functionality is one thing, but the negligence of the service team borders on illegal:
They managed to set up our transaction fees incorrectly, overcharging us for reservations for months. No one at the company knows how this happened. After having that issue acknowledged by our account manager, he left SevenRooms and we were not notified for a month (which caused many of its own issues).

After a week of chasing Support to re-acknowledge the issue, SevenRooms finally confirmed they would refund us the transaction fees. That was 3 weeks ago, and it has not yet been processed because their billing team literally cannot confirm for themselves the amount owed.

Excellent at selling you a product and apologising, but your actual experience with them will be painful.

originalText.text: They begged us to switch from the system we had been using for years to SevenRooms, well now we are switching back. What a nightmare. They can't provide what their sales people promise.

text.text: They begged us to switch from the system we had been using for years to SevenRooms, well now we are switching back. What a nightmare. They can't provide what their sales people promise.

originalText.text:
It has the framework of a solid system. An absolute nightmare to use during holidays due to their "apple only" business model.

Buyer beware, your associates deserve better.

text.text:

Buyer beware, your associates deserve better.

originalText.text: Used to be a great reservation system. However once you decide to quite, they will not follow up and keep your account open. I have an open account for a restaurant with active link for over five months. I have some guests making reservation on SEVENROOMS but we don’t even use it. Some guest were taken credit card details without us knowing. I have reported the issue many times over the past months but nothing has changed. Even tho they are replying every month from different people that they are closing our account. That’s really ridiculous. Also of course they are sending an invoice every month.

originalText.text: Awful customer service, not helpful and blames everything on a venue. Extremely disappointed.
